message.body: good morning slacker
slacker?
why am i the slacker?
I dunno, but you prolly are
i dont think soooo
what you do this weekend?
nothing
well thats fun
I went for a nice hike at Alapocas Run Park
ended up at Brandywine park in wilmington
niceeee
how long did that take?
a couple of hrs. They have an area for rockclimbing there. Its a nice park, right along the brandywine by the old Bancroft Mill
oh yea? hmmm
i think adam and ia re going to tak a trip up to hawk mountain this weekend and check it out
oh yeah, Ive been meaning to get up there. Im not sure when the hawks are migrating, but I think it was back in august but there may still be some
i dont really care about the hawks to be honest with you, i just heard it was gorgeous
the pinnacle is really cool, its a few miles from there
yea so ive heard. my co worker goes allthe time and says its nice
spossed to be a bit chilly this weekend though
mid sixties, I wouldnt worry about that, you'll be moving
yea, chillier up there, but itll be ok
so whats the status on larah/Arica?
oh, so what they're the same person now?
basically
yeah right. They couldnt be more different
well Im trying to figure out a way of breaking it off w/ arica
and why is that?
Im just not into it
i thought you were before?
I figure the best way is to slowly ease out of it over time
hahah youre just realizing this??
nah not really but I dont want to deal w/ it. She's too nice also. Its pointless. I enjoy spending time with her to a point but I dont want to drag it out much longer
well than tell her
its not that simple
YES it is
you make it WAY more complicated than need be
we're not in a relationship
we are just dating, so Im not really sure what she expects from me
sow hat
so why dont you do the courteous thing and tell her
tell her WHAT?
THAT YOU DONT WANT TO CONTINUE DATING HER ANYMORE
you can leave the weird part out and just tell her you dont want to see her
and how many times have you ended a 'not yet relationship'?
umm min of 3 times
how did that go?
fine actually
whatever, I do what I want
why is that?
we chatted last nite, shes like 'though about you earlier b/c I thought of driving down...'
this was at 11:30pm
so I jokingly say, 'come on by...hahaha'
anddd did she?
nooooo
shes like, 'lol...appealing
then said she had ceramics class tomorrow, or else she might
whatever
she still sucks
then ends with, she gonna go to bed. I could be up all night with you, but I do wanna see you soon. Im gonna make that happen.'
she has a problem
seriously, there is something wrong with her
I suppose so
shes no good
well then why arent you proactive about it?
as in?
idk, stop talking to her? lol
cause I dont want to
why dont I stop talking to you?
because im not crazy
I never said larah was crazy
ok, a little
but I enjoy her company and we arent really dating at this point
hahaha
i dont know. you KNOW its gonna get weird if you start hanging out agian
not necessarily, and if it does, it does
cross that bridge if/when I get to it
oh youll get to it
its my life damnit
besides, theres something nice about seeing someone when you know there is no chance of it developing into something serious
ok
do what makes you happy :)
thats what I do
and I try not to break too many hearts along the way
oh jesus
youre ridiculous
what
nothing
so what else is new? anything?
Its not about me being haughty or anything, it's just that I dont like to hurt people. Some people get attached and I know its not my responsibility but I cant help but feel guilty
well did you ever think by letting things just drop off 'casually' youre just hurting them more?
its far less painful if you just come out and say it
I make myself quite clear. others 'choose' to not see reality

theres no saving arica at this point. shes in too deep, and that is her doing. I told her from the beginning that I was not looking for anything serious. Did she think I was kidding? She chose to ingnore that. Therefore, when things dont work out, she will be dissapointed
Well why dont you cut to the chase now and just be upfront about it, as opposed to letting it drag out?
I AM being up front about it
i dont get it. some people need to be told directly that its not going to work. so help the girl out.
that is what, NOT looking for a relationship means
how is letting it die off being up front???
because that is what happens when you date someone
it will either work out or it wont. it will either continue or it will not
I will continue to see her for now until I decide not to
but I am trying to be careful to not give her the wrong idea, even though I have already clearly stated my intentions, actions speak louder than words
bullshit
larah and arica both know where they stand. arica chooses to not face reality
meh
i dont know why youre wasting her time if you know its not going where she wants it to
she has mental problems, shes on meds
so what. everyones on meds
and that shits relative
SHE IS WAISTING HER OWN TIME by dating someone who clearly stated that they are not looking for anything serious
Im not on meds
trust me, Ive been seeing her for a few weeks, she has issues
how so though?
funny that YOU view it as HER wasting her time when youre SO concerned about hurting other people
Im not going to get into details, but she is totally co-dependent for one
uh huhhh

my point being, if she felt that seeing someone that isnt looking for what she wants is waisting her time, then SHE should stop seeing me. Its not my job to tell her what she should be doing. she has to make that choice. I am casually dating because that is what I want to do
shes continuing to see you in hopes that 'what you want' will change
If she came out and said that she isnt interested in dating someone who isnt looking for something long term, then I would tell her and break it off
Right, but that is not a wise thing to do
if you know its going to hurt her more in the long run, then i feel as though you should have some type of conscience about that
you should NEVER expect a person to change for you
no its not, but its what people do
didnt say it was right, but its reality
and its not expecting the PERSON to change,its hoping their desires will
please, the longer she hangs around me the more a chance she will see what a jerk I am
well one can only hope
its a risk. I could say the same for larah. She told me she doesnt want a relationship, but I could HOPE that if I keep at it I can change her mind, blah, blah, blah
yea and?

But I dont buy it for one. EVERYONE wants to be in a relationship of some kind. What she is saying is, I dont want to be in a relationship w/ you. Thats fine, Im not going to take it personally. Now I can see her and theres no pressure there. We both want the same thing out of the relationship
okkayyy
its when we make unreasonable expectations of people that we get ourselves in trouble. There is no need to jump in the deep end in a relationship.
i get what youre saying, but i dont think its gonna stay that way
with?
with larah
I wouldnt be surprised if I never saw her again
yea well not fromw hat shes saying
how so?
I know better than to listen to what larah says
how you assume that these firls should be able to infer things from you and how you just 'let things go'
well id hope so
well I dont just infer them
anyway, ive got a mtg, so well chat soon
well whatever, you know what i mean
you expect them to
I do expect them to infer some things but anything I want to be clear on I will state
k, we need to do 'ritas or margaritas soon
ok jk, my mtg is tomorrow
yea i know
slacker
this effing class for grad school is KILLING me
i spent all weekend writing 3 papers
ha
Jen is bitching about it too
well thats what you get. itll be over before you know it
pshh 2 years from now
Im not saying that I handle things perfectly, but I do put thought into it
2 years is nothing in the scheme of things
yeaaaa but it sucks
besides, you're not exactly an objective party
thats standard
not jsut for you,but for everybody
hahahaha
can be
cause I lied/cheated etc, etc
at least I am honest
pshh if you call it that
IMHO, I never deceived, lied, cheated, or otherwise manipulated you
I was in no condition to be in a relationship at that point and I believe I made that quite clear
whatever, im not discussing it
on the phone, brb
i have something to dispute that
like I said, not objective.
Oh, DO SHARE
i will, one seccond
seeing one another', the ONLY time you wanted to 'hang out' was when I was halping you move
or i should probably say, let them drag out
its out of respect and courtesy that you do that for someone
and thats why i can OBJECTIVELY say that someone would appreciate being told uprfront
first of all, you have no proof
secondly, the moving thing was in a way, coincedental
no proof of what?
but also, the fact that I was, 'starting over' somewhere new did have something to do with it
ok well its great youre telling em this now, 2+ years later.
and in my defence, I was seriously not right in the head at this point. Also, you were leaving for your trip w/ the girls and I thought I had made it clear that we where to not see each other
I remember purposely doing this before your trip because I wanted you to enjoy yourself and not worry about us
doing what before my trip?
my recollection is not clear, but I thought I had told you before then
oh no no no
you left it up to me to text you when i got back
which is why i was furious haha
I could have sworn that something went down before you left
absolutely not
me helping you move until super late was what went down before i left
sooo it didnt exactly paint a pretty picture
geez, was I that out of it?

im a pretty understanding person, so i dont forget shit like that. anyway, i obviously didnt hold it against you for that long since were still friends, but what im saying is most people view it as being done out of respect and saving a lot of heart ache
oh yeaaaaaaaa
brb, gotta collect the stats!
okayyyyyyyy
I vaguely recall receiving a 'letter' from you around this point
I forget what happened after that
unfortunately myspace doesnt keep old 'sent' messages
oh yea, im dumb and like to write letters
haha i think it was probably handwritten anyway
buuuut I did get a myspace msg from you that was about 18 pages long
well cant say im surprised
yes, handwritten on line ruled paper
haha sounds about righ
right*
so i dont know if/what i wrote to tyou
you didnt
we prolly just talked about whatever i wrote about
there must have been something
you didnt write anything, im positive
ill check my myspace just to be sure
ahaha
Im quite surprised. I feel like something must have been said at some point, but then its kinda a blur
not before i left for vaca, thats for sure
and i had to drag it out of you when i came back
I suppose its possible, but Im still surprised. Im not usually that bad
well i wouldnt make something like that up
gotta runn, shuttin down for the day, text later and well figure out drinks or something
WTF
I thought you left
i did.
and now im home
trying to work on shit for this stupid project
we were supposed to have a mtg at 6, but im trying to veto it
ah, good luck with that
its working
only one more to get on board
wanna help with my project?
answer this question:
wtf am I a college student?
how does apple exploit its employees, environment, and society?
consider it hazing
you said you were thinkin about goin anyway
oh, shit yeah. I forgot I have to register
slacckkerrr
ok come on, lets focus, this is important
Well I can ask steve or greg how they exploit their employees since they work there
realllyyyy?
do it
Personally, I would just say they are probably underpaid. Well maybe not greg, he practically runs the apple store
yea
do they give them discounts?
cause that would be a good way to exploit them
as far as society, I would say they place an unnecessary desire in people to buy their products.
yea, but how
I actually was thinking about this the other day. I wondered how many psychologist are employed by ad firms
haha
theres a TON of psychology in marketing
well apple is about the image. They dont make anything unique really, they just make it more polished
right, but I wonder what specifically is being done to manipulate the public
I like to know when I am being fucked with
haha it happens a lot
people toy with emotions
I suppose their affect on the environment is just a matter of making a lot of disposable junk, but everyone does that so it's not fair to say
especially on the internet
everything is targeted
uh huhhh
and its not the envoronment per say, but how they exploit THEIR environment
like, do you know if they employ child labor or anything crazy? or where that stuff is manufactured?
as far as I know they are legit
not made here though, prolly in asia somewhere
hmmm

but see, nowadays everything is farmed out. SO a company in china will contract w/ apple to manfacture ipods or something. Therefore, apple has no control on what the labor conditions are for employees. U.S. laws do not apply since they arent manf. here
yea i know
so why you asking me?
im trying to generate ideas dammit!
haha
Bottom line is Apple is not the only co. doing this. It's business as usual these days
i have exploitation through their marketing, poss exploitation through employee discounts, exploitation through compatibility issues
and possibly exploitation through the facade of superiority
I like that last one. I dunno about the employee discounts
thats pretty typical, and I dont even know if they have them
i know, somn to look into though
I can ask greg
or steve, but I never talk to steve much
because you could argue they offer good discounts in attempt to exploit empoyees to purchase their product and thus the status associated with it
dumbass gettin married
ha why is that dumb?
nah, because they already work there, so people will just assume they use the products
ehh but it could be a motivating factor
idk, i need to come up with enough stuff to present, thats all i know
I would say the worst thing they do is their "coolness" marketing geared towards the youth culture
thats why i put marketing in there
im so ready to be done with this masters
yup, just 2 more years
ugh
